Package javavis.jip2d.functions

Class Summary
AddNoise It introduces random noise depending on the noise level indicated by the user.
AddPoint It adds a new geometric point, with the coordinates indicated as a parameter, in a POINT type image.
AddSegment It adds a new geometric segment, with the coordinates indicated as a parameter, in a SEGMENT type image.
AutomaticThresholding It implements the Otsu's method for automatic thresholding.
Binarize It converts a BYTE image into a binary image.
Blobs It implements the Blob algorithm to get connected regions in the image.
Brightness It adjusts the image brightness.
CalcHistoColor It calculates the histograms of a color image.
CalcHistoDB It calculates the histograms of a set of images in a directory.
Canny It implements the Canny method to edge detection.
CleanOmnidir It eliminates the exterior area of an omnidirectional image.
Closure It implements the closure operation.
ColorToGray It converts a COLOR image into a BYTE, BIT, SHORT or FLOAT image.
CompareDistances It calculates the distances of the input directory with the image DB.
Contrast It adjusts the image contrast.
ConvAlgorithm It defines and applies several well known algorithms for edge detection.
Convol3x3 It applies a convolution with a 3x3 mask defined by the user.
Convol5x5 It applies a convolution with a 5x5 mask defined by the user.
ConvolveAscii It applies a convolution of an image using a matrix (mask) defined in a text file.
ConvolveImage It applies a convolution of an image using the information from another image as convolution mask.
CountCoins It counts the number of coins in an image.
Crop It crops a rectangular area of the image.
Dilate It implements the dilate operation.
DivideBlobs It finds the blobs in a binary image.
Entropy It calculates the entropy of an image.
Equalize It equalizes an image.
EqualizeMean It moves the weighted mean of the histogram to a given level.
Erode It implements the erode operation.
FaceDetector It detects faces in an image.
FaceDetectorTrain It detects faces in an image (training).
FilterColor It applies a filter color to an image color.
Flip It makes a reversal of image pixels and geometric data from horizontal axis.
Flow It implements the optical flow algorithm which is defined by differential method of B.
FuzzyKMeans It applies the K-means algorithm to segment a gray or color image, but in the Fuzzy way, calculating the probability to each cluster.
Gabor It creates an image with a Gabor filter on the basis of orientation and scale.
Gamma It adjusts the intensity of the RGB bands in a COLOR image.
GeoToGray It converts the geometric elements of a geometric image in a gray scale bitmap.
Grad It calculates the image gradient.
GrayToColor It converts a BYTE, BIT, SHORT or FLOAT image into a COLOR image.
GrayToGray It converts a gray scale image into another gray scale image.
GroupImages It calculates distances from the input directory with the image DB, it is used in different distances like L1 norm, L2 norm, Kullback-Leiber divergence and Jeffrey divergence and different values like number of bins to compare the results.
HistoCirc It calculates a circular histogram of a binary image.
Histogram It calculates the histogram of an input image.
HistoKMeans It calculates the histograms of the input image and compares them to the ones in the imageDB (got from the CalcHistoDB).
HoughCirc It calculates all the possible circumferences presents in the image.
HoughLine It detects all the possible lines present in the image.
IntegralEntropy It calculates integral entropy image.
IntegralImage It calculates integral image.
InterpBi It re-renders an image using a bilinear interpolation.
InterSegment It calculates the intersection points of the segments in the input image.
Junctions It is the implementation of the methods proposed in "Two Bayesian Methods for JunctionAux Detection", M.
Kmeans It applies the K-means algorithm to segment a gray or color image.
LearnLT Learning process in the License Template application.
LevelThresholding It finds the optimal threshold to binarize an image.
Link It obtains an EDGE image from the output of function Canny.
LoadImage It loads the image (jpeg or gif) in the file indicated as parameter.
Mag It calculates the gradient magnitude using the square root of the sum of the square of the pixels from an image with an even number of bands.
Manhattan It finds the efficient orientation angle of the camera when it captured the image.
Maximum It changes the intensity value for the maximum value in a neighborhood window with a specified size.
MeanShift It applies the Mean-means algorithm to segment a gray image.
Minimum It changes the intensity value for the minimum value in a neighborhood window with a specified size.
Mirror It makes a reversal of image pixels and geometric data.
MSER It looks for the Maximally Stable Extremal Regions in an image.
Negate It calculates the negative of an image.
Nitzberg It implements the Nitzberg method for edge and corner detection.
Op It makes arithmetical operations (add, divide, and, etc.) between images and/or a value.
Opening It implements the opening morphological operation.
OpenWindow It checks image type and afterwards a new window is created and shown.
Pca It implements the learning step for Principal Component Analysis (PCA).
PcaNewCoordinates It calculates the new coordinates with Pca.
PcaRecognition It makes a recognition step of PCA.
Phase It calculates the phase magnitude using the arc tangent of the pixels from an image with an even number of bands.
Pixelate It pixelates an image.
RandomPoint It adds a number of new points with random coordinates.
RandomSegment It adds a number of new segments with random coordinates.
RecogLT It recognizes license plates.
RectifyOmnidir It extends a catadrioptic image as it is a cylinder.
RGBToColor It converts a RGB image into another color format (HSB, HSI or YCbCr).
RingCreateMask It creates the Ring Mask necessary for Transformation-Ring-Projection operations.
Rotate It rotates an image with a given angle.
Saliency It estimates the saliency of each pixel of the image at an only scale using Kadir and Brady method.
Scale It scales an image.
ScaleNew It scales an image.
ScaleSaliency It estimates the saliency of each pixel of the image at an only scale using Kadir and Brady method.
SearchImage It calculates the histograms of the input image and compares it to the ones in the image DB (got from the CalcHistoDB).
SegEdges It converts an Edge type image into a Segment type.
SegmentHSB It segments a HSB image using H (hue), S (saturation) and B (brightness) and binarizes the image.
Sharpen It sharpens an image using a convolution matrix (4-neighbors).
Skeleton It calculates the skeleton of the binary input image.
Skew It skews the image, using an angle and one of its sides.
Smooth It applies a smoothing to the image.
SmoothGaussian It applies a gaussian smoothing to the image.
SOM It makes the training of a SOM, applied to the image histogram problems.
Susan It implements the Susan method for corner and edge detection.
VisualAttention It obtains saliency areas from an input image.
VisualAttention2 It obtains saliency areas from an input image.
WaveHoriz It applies a wave effect to the input image, with horizontal distortion.
WaveVert It applies a wave effect to the input image, with vertical distortion.
